body_html:
Actually after giving it a little bit more thought, this might not be as useful as I thought it would be. My immediate analogy was drawn from an example in static computational graph frameworks (tensorflow/theano), but that doesn't apply to PyTorch in hindsight.

Sorry for the confusion!

body:
Actually after giving it a little bit more thought, this might not be as useful as I thought it would be. My immediate analogy was drawn from an example in static computational graph frameworks (tensorflow/theano), but that doesn't apply to PyTorch in hindsight.

Sorry for the confusion!
